mapper.insert: INSERT INTO book (title, author, publisher, price, description, attachment) VALUES (#{title}, #{author}, #{publisher}, #{price}, #{description}, #{attachment})
mapper.select: SELECT b.isbn, b.title, b.author, b.user_no, b.publisher, b.price, b.attachment, b.description, u.email, u.name, u.attachment as "uattachment" FROM book b, users u WHERE b.user_no = u.no AND b.isbn = #{isbn} ORDER BY b.isbn DESC;
